description: This file defines FastAPI route handlers for user registration, login, and retrieving current user info. It manages endpoints related to user authentication and user data retrieval.

classes.name: UserPublic
classes.description: Pydantic model representing public user data.

methods.name: UserPublic register_user( payload: UserCreate, users: Annotated[UserService, Depends(user_service)], )
methods.description: Endpoint for registering a new user with unique email and username.

methods.name: TokenResponse login( form_data: Annotated[OAuth2PasswordRequestForm, Depends()], users: Annotated[UserService, Depends(user_service)], tokens: Annotated[TokenService, Depends(token_service)], )
methods.description: Endpoint for user login, authenticating credentials and returning a token.

methods.name: UserPublic get_me(current_user=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve current authenticated user information.

ctags.name: login
ctags.signature: ( form_data: Annotated[OAuth2PasswordRequestForm, Depends()], users: Annotated[UserService, Depends(user_service)], tokens: Annotated[TokenService, Depends(token_service)], )
